column5: Came in the mail today from BP, some decent deals if you were waiting!
Thanks for the heads up McDoughy. I am waiting for a cheaply priced Med. weight combo.
5 bomber squarebills for $10?  Is BPS playing a trick on us?
Yes Sir, Says you can get 15 of them if you want! Friday the 15th only though!!!
I'll be there, looks like some great deals
So who's there tonight? I'll be lurking around the fly stuff
Hopefully the square bills won't all be one color or some odd ball size.
Just re-read the flyer, says that the point's are 1/100 cent  instead of the usual 2 cents

Scored 2 pairs of breathable SImms cheapy waders for $140 a pair..... With a lifetime warranty LOL!  They aren't fancy, but with a return policy like Simms has, I don't care!  I wonder if I can still get the warranty if I black out their logo LOL!
Why the heck would you black out the Simms? Lol
Thanks for the heads up.
I generally associate simms gear with whiny spey fishermen LOL!
Lol, I looove Simms
picked up a new tacklebag...
Just left with a handful of lures....spent more time in line to pay compared to looking around .
I also got 5 packs of the new Berkey Sick Fish. Should be sweet for Pike.
But I don't Spey fish, yet. LOL
LMAO!

i was there friday night after work,with the wife and kids. i couldnt get out of there fast enough.too many ignorant people pushing and at times purposely blocking isles. the sea of people around the reel desk was just stupid! couldnt move an inch. one till working and 1 - 2 guys answering questions and looking for the reels. ive been to the spring classic for the past 4 years or so and this was the worst as far as service was concerned. i grabbed as much as i could before i lost my temper. oh ya there was also a dude in a wheelchair purposely running over peoples feet and giving others attitude. not a good day

Ya the AGGIES guy had a bit of a problem it seemed.. I waited until 8:30 or so and the reel counter had lightened up considerably. Walked out with a nice new cold water lc. and alot of other stuff. Put a bunch of my export money into the economy.

Stoped in today after perchin all morning on CooksBay. Absolutley nuts in there. Lots of deals, but gonna wait till next Saturday to grab a rod/reel combo. About the service...maybe its just me, but I think it keeps getting better in there. Theres an older shorter curly haired guy that works the lure and rod section and he's been very helpful to me on more than a few ocasions and thought it should be mentioned. Just hoping they got my cheapy combo in stock next Saturday and hoping its not a zoo again.

Got there at 10:30 & left at 4:30, Bought what I wanted too, talked to lots of people & got one of Mercer's Flipp'n sticks free to boot, talked to Derek Strub, Peter Savoia, Simon Frost, Dave Mercer, a bunch of Bass Pro employees & a bunch of customers, my father & I had a great day, Great deal on KVD Spinnerbaits & other things needed or wanted lol & listen to a few of the Speakers Tight Lines SBK
